column3: Hearer Imedia seeks help in preventing uninvited guests from entering Little Solace.

Due to its temporary nature, the sylphic settlement of Little Solace has little in the way of defenses, and unruly fauna often wander in unchecked and terrorize the residents. In order to ensure the safety of the sylphs, Hearer Imedia bids you slay five ziz gorlins and five gnats.
You have put down the specified creatures. Report back to Hearer Imedia at Little Solace.
Thanks to your efforts, the residents of Little Solace can live without fear─for the time being. If only a more lasting peace could be secured so easily...
Report to Imedia at Little Solace.
Praise be to the elementals, an adventurer! The sylphs of Little Solace are sorely in need of aid. Pray hear me out.
Being a temporary settlement, Little Solace wants for amenities, not least a stout set of defenses. Consequently, beasts from malms around are free to wander in and terrorize the hapless residents.
If you could put down the ziz gorlins and gnats that roam these parts─five of each should suffice─the sylphs and I would be eternally grateful.
My sincerest thanks, adventurer. With the population of wild creatures thusly thinned, the sylphs will be able to live in peace...for a time.

Alas, this solution is no more permanent than the settlement of Little Solace itself. It would be best if the sylphs could return to their homeland, but present circumstance will not permit that possibility.
The sylphs face an uncertain future. Yet no matter how long it takes, with the elementals' guidance, we will see them safely home.
